package edge.pkg.abstracts.joinpoints;

import org.lara.interpreter.exception.AttributeException;
import edge.pkg.abstracts.AEdgeWeaverJoinPoint;
import java.util.Optional;
import java.util.stream.Collectors;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Auto-Generated class for join point ABase
 * This class is overwritten by the Weaver Generator.
 * 
 * 
 * @author Lara Weaver Generator
 */
public abstract class ABase extends AEdgeWeaverJoinPoint {

    /**
     * Get value on attribute a
     * @return the attribute's value
     */
    public abstract Integer getAImpl();

    /**
     * Get value on attribute a
     * @return the attribute's value
     */
    public final Object getA() {
        try {
        	Integer result = this.getAImpl();
        	return result!=null?result:getUndefinedValue();
        } catch(Exception e) {
        	throw new AttributeException(get_class(), "a", e);
        }
    }

    /**
     * Returns the join point type of this class
     * @return The join point type
     */
    @Override
    public String get_class() {
        return "base";
    }
    /**
     * 
     */
    protected enum BaseAttributes {
        A("a");
        private String name;

        /**
         * 
         */
        private BaseAttributes(String name){
            this.name = name;
        }
        /**
         * Return an attribute enumeration item from a given attribute name
         */
        public static Optional<BaseAttributes> fromString(String name) {
            return Arrays.asList(values()).stream().filter(attr -> attr.name.equals(name)).findAny();
        }

        /**
         * Return a list of attributes in String format
         */
        public static List<String> getNames() {
            return Arrays.asList(values()).stream().map(BaseAttributes::name).collect(Collectors.toList());
        }

        /**
         * True if the enum contains the given attribute name, false otherwise.
         */
        public static boolean contains(String name) {
            return fromString(name).isPresent();
        }
    }
}
